svg.text: AI-Powered Search MCP Integration Platform v3.0
Agricultural Analytics + Web Intelligence + Multi-Engine Search
Streamlit Web Interface - Agricultural Dashboards - AI Chat - Authentication - SSL/HTTPS Support
Multi-Provider AI Support (OpenAI/Anthropic) - Tool Management - Conversation History
LangChain Agent - Tool Selection - Context Processing - Multi-Provider Support (OpenAI/Anthropic)
MODEL CONTEXT PROTOCOL (MCP) - SSE & stdio Transports
Search Engines - AI Services - Agricultural Data - Web Content
• Health Check: No external API calls
• Caching Layers: 3 (Firecrawl maxAge, Google 2-tier, Perplexity API)
AI-Powered Search MCP Platform v3.0.0 - 16 Tools - 4 Servers - Multi-Engine Integration with Agricultural Analytics
